doc:
Cyril Cross https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyril_Cross 0 Cyril Cross was an English actor, who is best known for playing Monsieur Chargon in A Patriotic Offering of the first episode of the fourth series of the period drama Upstairs, Downstairs. It first aired on 14 September 1974 on ITV.He is also known for Doomwatch, Operation Daybreak and Dulcima.He was also shot down, and survived, in a Lancaster Bomber over Berlin, in 1943. Cyril_Cross was an_English_actor , who is_best_known for playing Monsieur_Chargon in A_Patriotic_Offering of the_first_episode of the_fourth_series of the_period_drama_Upstairs , Downstairs . It first aired on 14_September_1974 on ITV.He is_also_known for Doomwatch , Operation_Daybreak and Dulcima.He was_also_shot down , and survived , in a_Lancaster_Bomber over Berlin , in 1943 .
